Dive into AI-Enhanced Insights and Solutions with PM-Brain's 'My AI' section!

In PM-Brain's Personal Account, the "Identified problems" section offers users a deep dive into team data and AI-driven solutions. Access detailed member profiles, performance metrics, task statuses, and workload insights. Understand why tasks go unfinished. Explore success stories, evaluate AI solutions, and provide feedback to enhance team management and decision-making.

Discover Your Team's Hidden Strengths with PM-Brain!

In the PM-Brain system, our "Team Overview" section unveils the power of your team dynamics. Easily view all your team members and pinpoint those where AI detects issues. Plus, you can seamlessly add an unlimited number of sites to your team for comprehensive insights. Let PM-Brain empower your team's success!

Stay in Sync with Your Team's Pulse!

PM-Brain's "Pulse Polls" section is your go-to for real-time team insights. Tailor these polls to your team's current situation, and we'll send them out like clockwork every two weeks. Your team members receive these questions via fan mail, and AI works its magic by analyzing the data, uncovering issues, and providing valuable insights. Keep your team's heartbeat strong with PM-Brain!

"Empower Your Leadership with the Performance Dashboard!

Welcome to the Performance Dashboard section of PM-Brain, your window into data-driven leadership. This section offers a visual representation of key metrics and insights tailored to your team's dynamics. Dive into detailed performance analyses, track task statuses, workload distribution, and individual contributions. Gain a comprehensive understanding of your team's progress, enabling you to make informed decisions and drive productivity. Elevate your management skills with the Performance Dashboard section of PM-Brain!"

Unlock the Potential of X-Test in PM-Brain: Gain Deep Insights into Your Team's Dynamics

Welcome to the X-Test section of PM-Brain, where you'll unlock a comprehensive view of your team's dynamics. Our unique methodology adapts to your leadership style, offering valuable insights to optimize your team's performance. Through thoughtfully designed questions and AI analysis, you'll uncover crucial aspects of your team's dynamics and receive tailored recommendations. Track progress over time and aim for the 'X' in your test results to achieve balance and success. Elevate your leadership with the X-Test section of PM-Brain!"

The most common questions

Who Is It For?
PM Brain is a versatile management solution designed to cater to the needs of various professionals within organizations. It serves the following target audiences:
  • Middle Managers:
    • Middle managers looking to optimize team performance and enhance decision-making capabilities.
    • Those seeking tools for effective team management and coordination.
  • Senior Managers:
    • Senior-level executives aiming to streamline processes and improve overall team productivity.
    • Leaders interested in accessing comprehensive insights into their teams.
  • Teams of All Sizes:
    • Small to large teams across different departments and industries.
    • Teams seeking to boost collaboration and efficiency.
  • Department Heads:
    • Heads of departments who want to make data-driven decisions and allocate resources wisely.
    • Those focused on achieving their department's goals effectively.
What Do You Get?
When you embrace PM Brain, you gain access to a wide array of benefits and insights:
  • Individual Team Member Data:
    • Detailed information on each team member, including task statuses, workloads, and psychological well-being.
    • Insights into reasons for task non-completion, helping identify areas for improvement.
  • Resource Management:
    • The ability to analyze the efficiency of each team member and assess resource allocation.
    • Tools to determine where resources such as salaries, software, and licenses are being utilized.
  • Tailored Team Motivation:
    • Customized motivation strategies for each team member based on automatic analysis.
    • Individualized support to address specific needs and improve team morale.
  • Budget Control:
    • Comprehensive oversight of your annual budget, ensuring even distribution.
    • Insights into budget allocation, wage costs, and recruitment expenses.
How Does It Work?
PM Brain's operation is rooted in advanced technology and a deep understanding of management dynamics:
  • Neural Network Algorithms:
    • PM Brain's neural network is founded on 700 case studies, covering various management scenarios.
    • Developed with input from 70 top-tier managers and middle-level executives.
  • Pulse Surveys:
    • Regular pulse surveys are conducted among team members to gather critical data.
    • These surveys generate data points used for analysis, allowing for a deep understanding of your team's dynamics.
  • Data-Driven Insights:
    • The system compiles and analyzes survey data to identify potential issues within your team.
    • It provides recommendations and insights to help you make informed decisions and improve team dynamics.
  • Managerial Balance:
    • PM Brain assists in achieving a balanced management approach.
    • It factors in key management criteria, such as compromise level, control requirements, necessary influence, and support.
PM Brain is the future of efficient team management, offering tailored solutions to meet your organization's unique needs
